note.p: Birth: Tainfield House, Taunton, Somerset, England (1776)
Death: Tainfield House, Taunton, Somerset (06 March 1851)

Career: Entered the Royal Engineers (1793); Lieutenant (1796); Captain (1805); served in Holland (1799), at Copenhagen (1807), and in Portugal; one of the chief officers preparing the lines at Torres Vedras; Secretary to Lord Mulgrave, Master General of Ordnance (1810); Colonel (1813); Governor of Bermuda and lived there (until 1839); Major-General (1837); Lieutenant- General (1847)
